TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit DispatchSource/DataOr extends CoreFoundation.DispatchSource/Data

Docs.summary: Dispatch sources that allow applications to trigger an event handler on the target queue.
Docs.remarks: Applications can post data onto a by calling the method. The data is surfaced is then available in to the handler in the property which will contain the cumulative logical or of all the values posted with MergeData.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class CoreFoundation.DispatchQueue queue) cil managed

Docs.param: The target queue for this dispatch source object. Pass null to use the default target queue (the default priority global concurrent queue).
Docs.summary: Creates a DataOr source that delivers events on the specified queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int handle) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a DataOr DispatchSource from an unmanaged pointer.

Docs.summary: Creates a DataOr DispatchSource from an unmanaged pointer.
